participant_1.name: Maxwell
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, always seeking new experiences.
participant_1.background: My life s passion is designer french fries. My daily driver is a bicycle that you pedal with your hands. My favorite band is U2. I once fell up a whole flight of stairs. I am the leader of the french fry research department at Del Taco.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Whimsical and caring, with a love for animals and a keen eye for aesthetics.
participant_2.background: I have always wanted a pot bellied pig. My favorite book is Anne of Green Gables. I love owning nice office supplies. I won a beauty pageant one time but didn t feel like it was worth the effort. My mom teaches kindergarten and my dad is a tax assessor.

content.text: Hi, I'm a french fry researcher.
That's interesting! What's your favorite kind of french fry?
I like them all, but my favorite is probably the waffle fry.
I love waffle fries too! They're so crispy.
They are! I'm actually the leader of the french fry research department at Del Taco.
That's so cool! I didn't know Del Taco had a french fry research department.
We do! We're always trying to come up with new and innovative ways to make french fries.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're doing great work.
Thanks! We're trying our best.
I'm sure you'll come up with something amazing.
We hope so!
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to ride my bike. I have a hand-pedal bike that I love to take on long rides.
That sounds like fun! I used to ride my bike a lot when I was younger.
I love it! It's a great way to get exercise and see the sights.
I agree! It's also a lot of fun to go on bike rides with friends.
It is! I love biking with my friends.
So, what are you looking for in a friend?
I'm looking for someone who is kind, funny, and loves to have fun.
That sounds like me!
It does! I think we're going to be great friends.
I think so too!
